articles.title: How long will it take to vaccinate Kent? Rates show one million people waiting for coronavirus jab in Kent and Medway - Kent Online
articles.description: A third of adults in Kent have received their first vaccine dose - this is how long it would take to jab the whole county if current rates continue.
articles.content:
Almost third of adults in Kent have received their first Covid vaccine dose.
